Package index

All functions

get_changes()
Get Latest Exchange Rates For Devises
get_changes_historic()
Get Historic of Exchange Rates For Devises
get_historic()
Get Historical Financial Data For Ticker Symbols
get_historic_light()
Get Historical Financial Data For Ticker Symbols
get_similar()
Find Similar Financial Symbols
last_crypto()
Get Latest Cryptocurrencies Values (USD) and Market Data
last_currencies()
Get Currencies Names, Symbols and Add Latest 'USD' Values
last_indices()
Get World Financial Indices Latest Values (USD)
last_market_summary()
Retrieve Market Index Summary Latest Data
search_asset_quick()
Search Financial Asset From a Keyword (Single Text)
search_assets()
Search Financial Asset From Keywords (Multiple Texts)
search_summary()
Get Latest Financial Information and Ticker Symbol From Company Name(s)
valid_symbol()
Validate Financial Symbols
